details.description:
Public hours:
Monday to Friday - 9.00am to 12.00pm
            
Office hours: 
Monday to Thursday - 8.00am to 4.00pm 
Friday - 8.00am to 12.00pm
Passports collection Monday - Friday 9.00am to 12.00pm
details.access_and_opening_times:
Disabled access

We aim to make ourselves as accessible to everyone as possible. The High Commission staff are more than happy to assist with wheel-chair access for persons with wheel-chairs. On arrival, speak with the guards at the guard house and they will contact the Main Reception who will arrange for the wheel-chair access to be opened and assistance given.

We also welcome guide dogs and provide assistance upon request to visually impaired visitors.

2018 Public holidays

The British High Commission will be closed on the following local and UK public holidays:

  • Monday, 1st January, 2018 New Year’s Day
  • Friday, 30th March, 2018 Good Friday
  • Monday, 2nd April, 2018 Easter Monday
  • Monday, 7th May, 2018* May Bank Holiday
  • Monday, 28th May, 2018* Spring Bank Holiday
  • Monday, 29th May, 2018* Privilege Holiday for Queens Birthday (UK) – (In Lieu of Privilege Holiday for * Queens birthday that falls on Saturday, 26th May 2018)
  • Monday, 11th June, 2018 Queen’s birthday
  • Monday, 23rd July, 2018 National Remembrance Day
  • Monday, 27th August, 2018 Summer Bank Holiday
  • Tuesday, 28th August, 2018* The National Repentance Day (In Lieu of Repentance Day that falls on Sunday, 26th August, 2018)
  • Monday, 17th September, 2018 Independence day (In lieu of Independence day that falls on Sunday, 16th September, 2018)
  • Tuesday, 25th December, 2018 Christmas Day
  • Wednesday, 26th December, 2018 Boxing Day

Holiday’s marked* are UK Public & Privilege Holidays
